```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import altair as alt

np.random.seed(42)
data = pd.DataFrame(np.random.rand(100), columns=['Random Numbers'])

def preview_data(df, x):
    results= [df.head(),
    alt.Chart(df).mark_bar().encode(
      alt.X(x),
      alt.Y("count()"))]
    return results


preview_data(data, 'Random Numbers')
```
